creditline: Collection of Kim and Gloria Anderson
description: a: off-white folder with embossed Presidential seal on front; b: color print of the White House with trees, two girls and two dogs out front; attached at top to a; c: white tissue insert; d: white cardboard; e: white cardboard; f: white envelope with silver metal clasp
marks: Signatures, date and Inscription on print, LRC in black: [(holiday greeting) Lyndon
title: South Lawn with Johnson girls and dogs
